name: String Splitter Processor
description: Splits a string up into a list of values based on a separator

parameters.name: field
parameters.description: The name of the field that should be split

parameters.name: separator
parameters.description: The separator used to split on

parameters.name: overwrite
parameters.description: Where the original value in field should be overwritten (true) or whether the result should be appended as a separate field (false)
